titleStmt.title: His Maiesties speech to both houses of Parliament, July the 5th 1641 with Mr. Speakers speech, before the King, in the vpper house of Parliament, July the 3, 1641, concerning the passing of three bills, 1. poll-money, 2. Star-chamber, 3. high commission.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
A review by the King of his recent concessions to Parliament and a similar review by Speaker Lenthall of Parliament's concessions to the King.
